content.rendered:
Thanks for checking out my “about me” page!  My name is Jason Plumb, and I live in Missouri.  I have worked in retail, sales, mail delivery, and my hobby has always been cars.  My hope for the site is that it is not more trash on the garbage heap that can be the internet, but that it actually has useful content.

 

Why make a website about transmissions?

My grandpa worked the line at GM and I really have always loved the brand.  I had to look something up on the 700R4 and found that it was hard to get all the info I needed.  After that I thought why not make a website.  I’ve always wanted to try that.  Here you are now!  I hope it helps.  If you would like to add anything to the site, or have some (constructive) criticism, please drop me a line.  You can do so from my contact page.

Again, thank you so much for swinging by.
